page.title: 04MANNING'S FARM
page.content: We went to{Mannings farm}in Feering,it is owned by the Mannings family.The farm has 430 acres.Before 1850 all Mannings' farmland from Feering to Earls Colne belonged to the church.Mannings farm is a commercial cereal farm. The Crops. crop no of acres. Winter wheat 250. Winter rape 50 Peas 20. Winter beans 30. Black currants 45. Willow trees 2000 trees Mannings farm uses 25 millon gallons of water a year.It has 3 tractors,a seed drill and a combine havester.They also do there own repairs in a barn.There are 2 main sorts of wheat, one for bread and for animal feed.
